p: Ethyl (E)-2-((1H-1,2,4-triazol-1-yl)methyl)-3-phenylacrylate (42). Purification using ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (2:8 → 1:1) allowed the isolation of the product as a white powder in 44% yield. E: 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.23 (s, 1H), 8.06 (s, 1H), 7.97 (s, 1H), 7.77 − 7.62 (m, 2H), 7.57 − 7.34 (m, 3H), 5.20 (s, 2H), 4.26 (q, J = 7.1 Hz, 2H), 1.31 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H).
